author: Aruna Viswanatha
title: Andrew McCabe Kept Notes About Conversations With Trump, Gave Them to Mueller
text:
Former FBI Deputy Director Andrew McCabe wrote memos describing his conversations with President Donald Trump and other events and has turned them over to Special Counsel Robert Mueller, a person close to Mr. McCabe said Saturday. 
The memos, written very soon after the events they describe, cover Mr. McCabeâ€™s dealings with the White House and what former FBI Director James Comey told Mr. McCabe about his interactions, according to the person. 
...
